snippet.title: Why My New Game Has No Devlogs...
snippet.description:
Le Château will have a playable demo during the upcoming Steam Next Fest, starting October 9!

Wishlist now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2365980/Le_Chteau/

Check out KenneyNL: https://www.kenney.nl/
And of course @icoso@icoso 

Music by Epidemic Sounds

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/tshelfman
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theshelfman/
Discord: https://discord.gg/TAXVqGd
Play My Games: https://theshelfman.itch.io/
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/theshelfman

Subscribe here!
https://www.youtube.com/subscription_...

-------------- actual description ------------
With Steam Next Fest approaching (October 9th), it's time to finally share what I've been working on. Le Château is a minimalistic city builder game that's all chill, and no stress. Build the kingdom of your dreams, and unlock new tiles to make even cooler kingdoms!
I've been working on this game since March of this year, and it's basically finished, but I'm hoping to get some great feedback from the demo that'll be playable during the festival, and hopefully make the game as cool and fun as possible.

Looking forward to hearing what you think!

-------------

Some of my other videos worth checking out:

I'm Quitting Unity...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=66QYrZovyHM

This Mistake RUINED My Dream Game!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jQEoZMdghxk

#theshelfman #devlog #gamedev #steamnextfest #steamgame #indiegame
